Reference version 0.5-6

All functions

ebnm_ash

A wrapper to the ash function for flash.

ebnm_pl

EBNM using point-laplace prior, from ebnm package.

ebnm_pn

ebnm_pn

flash_add_factors_from_data

Add factors to a flash fit object based on data.

flash_add_fixed_f

Add a set of fixed factors to a flash fit object.

flash_add_fixed_l

Add a set of fixed loadings to a flash fit object.

flash_add_greedy

Fit Empirical Bayes Matrix Factorization (greedy algorithm)

flash_add_lf

Add factors or loadings to f.

flash_backfit

Refines a fit of the flash model to data by "backfitting".

flash_fill

Use a flash fit to fill in missing entries.

flash_get_k

Get number of factors in a fit object.

flash_get_ldf

flash_get_ldf

flash_get_lf

Return the estimated LF' matrix.

flash_get_objective

Get objective function from flash data and flash fit objects.

flash_get_pve

flash_get_pve

flash_plot_factors

Plot the factors from flash results.

flash_plot_pve

Scree plot.

flash_set_data

Set up data for reading into flash.

flash_update_precision

Update precision parameter.

flash_zero_out_factor

Zero out a factor from f.

flash

Fit Empirical Bayes Matrix Factorization

plot_one_factor

Factor plot.

udv_random

udv_si
